aka: The Least Expected Day: Inside the Movistar Team
trans_title: 胜负难料:Movistar勇闯大环赛 第一季
The Least Expected Day: Inside the Movistar Team
introduction: The Least Expected Day: Inside the Movistar Team 2019 is a documentary series produced by Netflix to give an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the riders in the Movistar Team. The original Spanish title for the series is El Día Menos Pensado.The series covers the 2019 UCI World Tour and premiered on 27 March 2020.（胜负难料:Movistar勇闯大环赛：2019年Movistar团队内部是由Netflix制作的纪录片系列，旨在为Movistar Team的骑手们提供独家幕后花絮。该系列的最初西班牙语名称是ElDíaMenos Pensado。系列赛涵盖2019年UCI世界巡回赛，并于2020年3月27日首播。）
chinese_title: 胜负难料:Movistar勇闯大环赛 第一季
